programme.title: Christmas Wedding Runaway
programme.desc: Maggie Mason, a runaway bride, does some soul-searching when she's trapped in a snowed-in cabin with her grandmother and an old flame at Christmas.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When a woman returns home to find her ex in a relationship, she enlists her best friend to act as her fake boyfriend.

programme.title: Coupled Up for Christmas
programme.desc: Tiffany finally reunites with her longtime crush, Brett, only to find out he has a serious girlfriend. She decides to pair up with a recently heartbroken Peter to win back the affection of their respective soulmates.

programme.title: Love at the Christmas Contest
programme.desc: Angie enters a tree decorating contest to honor the memory of her mother. To Angie's surprise, her high school sweetheart, David, and his daughter, Gabby, have entered the contest as well.

programme.title: A Cape Cod Christmas
programme.desc: When a children's author hosts one last Christmas dinner with her disagreeable siblings before they sell the family house, she reunites with her childhood sweetheart who helps her find a way to keep the home she loves so dearly.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Sue gets called in after a car theft suspect turns out to be deaf and communicates solely through sign language.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: A criminal Dimitrius put behind bars for 10 years gets released with revenge in mind against him and his family.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Sue clashes with her visiting mom over holiday preparations, leaving her dad and Lucy stuck in the middle.

programme.title: Holiday High School Reunion
programme.desc: Returning home for Christmas, a woman (Rachel Boston) develops an unexpected attraction to her best friend from school.

programme.title: Meet Me at the Christmas Train Parade
programme.desc: When Charlotte's son Benny learns about an old tradition, he persuades her to try and reignite the Christmas magic that brought neighboring communities together.

programme.title: A Christmas Vintage
programme.desc: Samantha goes home to help her love struck sister, Emily, during the holidays. She discovers that Emily and Tony can not be together unless Samantha attracts and dates the unpleasant Parker Williams, an owner of a competing winery.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas Pairing
programme.desc: After a bad review from a food critic, renowned chef Grace Cooke returns home for Christmas and reconnects with her roots.

programme.title: A Vineyard Christmas
programme.desc: Heather is determined to create the perfect Christmas episode by featuring a unique winery from her hometown.

programme.desc: When a children's author hosts one last Christmas dinner with her disagreeable siblings before they sell the family house, she reunites with her childhood sweetheart who helps her find a way to keep the home she loves so dearly.
